name: Platformer (eniallator)
description:
My intentions in making this were to force myself to think of ways to implement things like map compression (which this game TOTALLY HAS! :D). It's a bit unfinished currently but I am trying to think of what else to put in the game. If you have any suggestions/requests/ideas you would like to see in the game, please do tell me.

It's got it's own map creator as well so you can create a map and also send it to anyone.
